  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientSkeleton
    This class is used in socket protocol, it receives the update from the client through his server stub and forwards them to the server implementation.
    GameControllerImpl
    This class is the controller of a specific game.
    ServerImpl
    Main server, used to manage the lobby and the starting games, it also takes trace of all the clients and started games.
    VirtualView
    Representation server-side of the client's view, it receives the updates from the model and forwards them to the client through the network.
